content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Walking my dog  at about 11:30 on my way back i noticed this light because it was the only one in the sky. it was a rainy night so there were no stars visible and this light was so bright and orange and it looked like it was glowing not shining like a star does. the way it was hovering did not look natural at alll. i knew it couldn't be a plane or a helicopter because it was way to big and way to bright and also it was below the rain clouds. it didn't move much but you could tell it was hovering and moving in these odd circles. i called my friend to tell him what i was seeing and as soon as i told him i was as looking at a ufo the orange light split into two smaller green lights and then about another minute later those turned into 3 white lights in the shape of a triangle. at this point i was super freaked out. about another minute later they disappears and i never saw them again. i tried to take a video with my phone camera bunfor some reason the light would not show up! i took at least 3 pictures but all of them came out black as then night sky even though this light was bright enough my camera should have caught it.
content.summary: Huge orange orb of light split into 2 green then 3 white lights in triangle

content.detailedDescription: From my rooftop i noticed a golden light inside or behind a cloud. it brightened and glowed for about 5 seconds and faded  this happened about 3 times and then i started to take pictures of it. picture is of a line of lights taken from my cellphone. galaxy s7. at around the same time a friend saw a golden circular object streak across the sky make a sharp right turn and disappear.  the line of lights was not visible to the naked eye. it has only shown up in the picture.  i cannot give an estimate of distance but it was a cloudy night and this light was somehow in or behind a cloud.  this entire episode lasted about 10 = 15 minutes then it was gone
content.summary: Lights seen inside a cloud

content.detailedDescription: This event lasted for 8 hours orbs coming out of the ocean and human like entities going in the ocean,there was so much going on to witness that it kind of felt like a ceremony was happening before my eye's,i did not record any of this i did not want to disterb the ceremony,it felt like i was accepted to watch,they knew i was there,i have witnessed much more but it is to much to disclose, in the presence of them i feel very overwhelmed with kindness and compaction like they make me feel super happy.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile
content.summary: From 10 pm to about 6 am,august 19 the to august 20 the there was a lot of different kind's of activities from human like entities disappearing into the ocean,orbs the size of a basketball glowing green coming out of the ocean!

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on cr26 west of sr 19 just passed cr 1 when i noticed a really bright orange/gold lights over the 20 bypass. at first i thought it was a helecopter unntil it all of a sudden it just zoomed south into the clouds in a split second and all i could see was a bright dot in the clouds. as fast as it zipped into the clouds it came back again over the by pass. it was huge and very bright. there was another car about a mile east of me and we both were almost stopped watching it as it was looking like it was coming closer to us and thats when we both hurried up to get to beech road and get away from there. after i got home i was looking up at the stars whenn i noticed that there was at least a dozen orbs cigar shaped crafts in the sky above osceola & south western elkhart county. i also observed orange orbs coming out from underneath the objects and coming down above the tree tops like they were looking for something or just filming what is here. the night before i was outside around 11 pm with my dog when a bright object zipped down from the western sky and was traveling very fast when it collided with a triangle shaped craft . the triangle shaped craft started spinning out of control for a few seconds then it was back under control and hovering for a minute then all of a sudden it vanished. the object that hit the triangle craft just kept lying very fast to the east. i don't know if anyone saw that happen other than myself. i don't have an i phone or i would've been able to take pictures. every time that i've tried to take pictures my camera shuts off all by its self or they just don't show on film.
content.summary: Object was hovering over 20 bypass near jimtown museum

content.detailedDescription: At or about 2005 hrs. on friday the 21st of october 2016 i observed a white ball of unknown size at an unknown altitude moving west to east with out a sound at a very rapid speed. i first observed the object at approximately the 12 o'clock position, i observed it for approximately 15 seconds when it disappeared over the horizon. i appeared to be on a straight flight path and might have been decending in altitude. the object flew along a line between needles, ca. and page, az.
content.summary: Small white light, slightly larger than mars appeared.

content.detailedDescription: Took my mother over to a doctor's appointment in winston salem near forsyth hospital. while sitting in my vehicle in the parking lot, something shiny caught my eye in the sky to the north. it was clearly a sphere, flying south at a high rate of speed. i continued to watch over the next 30 or so minutes and counted 113 spheres. some were flying side by side, one in front of the other and several at one point zig zagging around one another. at one point i observed an airplane flying towards the south west and the spheres were whizzing across its flight path. i would estimate that the spheres were traveling 10 times as fast as the plane. once a sphere would come into view, it was only visible for about 3 seconds. if not for the sun, i would have never seen them. they were coming from the north and heading south. no change in direction. i counted 113 of them total. may have been more but that's how many i was able to see. almost all of them with the exception of a few, were higher in altitude than the airplane. would be hard to say how big they were but, i would estimate perhaps half as big as the airplane that flew over and perhaps a few bigger than the plane. i watched for several more minutes and didn't see any more.
content.summary: 113 unknown sphere objects

content.detailedDescription:
12 year old kid with some deer hunters

lights towards near mountain

other deer hunters

started with one light, which i thought were hunters. eventually 2 more joined first light. when fourth light joined other three, they hovered for some minutes, then zoomed away, and out-of-sight toward south east and imperial desert

by this time all persons, hunters and families were observing lights, nearly speechless, only to comment as to what we were observing. we had never heard of ufo's. totally silent, remember this was before helicopters. after they vanished, we talked for moe than an hour as what we witnessed, of course most opinions came from adults...Robert roedor and i mainly listened to adults.

like anything flying away, it was gone within a few seconds or faster.
content.summary: While on hunting trip in borego, calif. these event occurred in the evening

content.detailedDescription: Looked out of the window and saw a lot of lights in the sky. when outside and watched them come from the north over the tree tops and float to the south east rising into the clouds until they could no longer be seen.
content.summary: Flickering flame floating in the sky bright red on the outside orange inside

content.detailedDescription: Like i said before we were passing the school heading south on 14th st when i told my friend to take a look by that time i was fumbling for my phone to take a pic it was in the west over grand prairie or arlington texas what made me notice there was no clouds or air traffic ,when i first saw it i thought maybe balloon but the color and the shape were odd and no navigation lights any how before we reached the next intersection we lost sight it was in a south bound location we came around the corner and we seen it again by that time it had moved what seemed like a good distance from when we first seen it and there not being any wind if it was a balloon it traveled to fast it felt good seeing one but being dark in color seemed somewhat ominous.
content.summary: A friend and i were pulling out of his neighborhood heading south about a quarter mile down the road i looked to my right and noticed a dark object in the west we were just then passing a football field at a junior high school at that time a told my frien

content.detailedDescription:
This phenomenal sighting was in july 2012.  i was on a lake, little long lake, in nearby angola, indiana.  the lake is divided by both indiana and michigan line.  

i was on a pontoon boat sitting at the dock waiting for some friends who were using the bathroom in the cottage. it was approximately 10:30 p.M.  the skies were clear and full of stars.  being on lake with little or no lights around the area, made it very easy, and enjoyable looking at the stars.  it was an exceptional night for star gazing, which i love to do.

several other people were on the pontoon boat at the same time.  i was laying down on one of the seats looking up at the stars in the sky. i happened to look to my right, which would be a northerly direction. as i looked off to my right, i noticed a glowing white ball in the sky, which seemed to get bigger as i gazed at it.  it was moving toward our position.  i figured it might be some kind of fireworks since it was just after the 4th of july (this incident was on saturday, july 7th).  but there weren't any other fireworks being set off at the time.  i was curious so i continued to watch this globe move toward me.  maybe it was a plane, but the globe or circle of light was too big to be a plane.  

i sat up to get a better view of this display.  my friend was directly across from me laying on the other reclined seat. he was looking in a westerly direction.  his sister-in-law was in one of the captain's seat in the front of the boat looking east.

the light got as big as a penny and then it burst into a perfect rectangular shape light.  no globe shaped figure anymore, just a solid glowing white light in a rectangular shaped - like the globe exploded but no fragments - just a perfectly shaped very long rectangle. this was only a few seconds before there was nothing.  it was gone.  

i blurted out - "what the heck was that!"  my friend didn't move and just asked "what?"  his sister-in-law asked the same.  i said right there as i pointed in the direction of the white globe turned rectangular burst.

as my friend exclaimed what did you see, and his sister-in-law was repositioning herself to look in the direction i was gazing, two smaller spheres or globes appeared; one coming from a westerly direction and the other coming from the east. one was a "red" color or "scarlet" colored globe - smaller than the white globe before it burst into the rectangular shape.  the other globe was "purple" or violet colored globe.  they came to rest on top of one another, it seemed. just for a second before one accelerated very fast straight up and the other straight down.  this all happened quickly - not in slow motion - but in a few seconds. so before my friend's sister-in-law was able to position herself to look in the direction i was locked onto, the globes were gone.

i was really excited and said "oh my god" look at that.  my friends sister-in-law was turned around at the time and said - "what" ... i pointed in the direction of where these two globes had just disappeared.  all of sudden they both appeared again coming from the same direction they did before, from the west and the other from the east.  they again stopped above each other - like resting on top of one another - for just a second or two and then just took off directly away from our position - very quickly until you couldn't see them. 

my friend's sister-in-law said, "what the heck was that?"  i said, "did you see that - good - i don't want to be the only one who saw that."

september 2016 (saturday):

my wife and i were visiting with some friends who owned a cottage on snow lake - again in the angola, indiana area.  this lake is not far from little long lake.  

we were out on the pontoon during the evening to see the lake at night. it was a very clear night and again good for star gazing.  my friend was asking about the sighting i had witnessed in 2012.  i was explaining the entire situation when i was gazing in the sky and said, "look at that ball moving across the sky."  it's too big to be a plane, it's really moving too fast to be a plane (jet), it could be a satellite, it's not a comet because there is no trail.  we all gazed at it and made comments about being something other than a a plane or jet - maybe a satellite.  all of a sudden the ball stopped and then took off straight away from us until it was gone.  we all gazed at each other and said - "what the heck was that."

these are two very peculiar sightings i have witnessed in the same area.
content.summary: Sphere shaped object - very bright - changed to very long rectangular burst of light, then two smaller shaped spheres, two different colors, straight path, then one ascending and the other descending, and finally accelerating very quickly straight away

content.detailedDescription:
It was between 10:00 pm and 10:30 pm on oct. 20, 2016 and i was walking back to my house after taking my trash to the curb. i have a large yard with a long driveway so it takes a few minutes to walk out there and back. 

as i rolled the can to the street an airliner coming from charlotte douglas international airport flew over and i heard the sound of it fade by the time i parked my trash can at the pickup spot. we get a lot of air traffic overhead and it is pretty normal to hear the jets fly over at all hours of the day and night. there were no more airplanes that passed overhead after that one was gone.

as i turned toward my house, i remembered that i had heard that there was going to be a meteor shower soon, so i looked up at the sky to see if i could see any. my house is located between two urban areas, so to the east and to the west, there is a constant urban glow in the night sky.

when i looked up, i saw a dark triangle silhouetted against that urban glow.

i thought, "am i really seeing this?" but i did not take my eyes off of it until it disappeared. when i saw it, the object was almost straight overhead, moving south to north. the northern part of the sky is much darker here, so when it reached that part of the sky, it disappeared from view. the whole incident took maybe five seconds, if that long. it moved very fast across half of the sky, from around 90 degrees overhead to where it disappeared about 20 degrees above the horizon -- much, much faster than the low-flying airliners that i am used to seeing. there was absolutely no sound at all to accompany the sighting.

one other thing i noticed about it was that the trailing edge of the triangle seemed to have a very faint glow to it. i don't know if that was reflection of the lights on the ground or if it was emanating from the object. there were no other lights on the object. it was a solid, dark silhouette. the faint glow on the back was the last thing i saw before it disappeared against the blackness of the northern sky.

last comment: i am dumbfounded as to, if it was one of ours, why it would fly without lights across a busy air lane.
content.summary: A triangle without lights flew across the night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Wife and i went outside to our backyard for her to smoke, started looking up at the sky due to possibility of orionid meteor shower. first 30 seconds outside, dark, faitly glowing, cloud-like wing or boomerang shaped mass flew directly overhead with almost no noise, just gentle swish like the wind blowing through the trees. speed was too fast for a formation of migrating birds. first thought it was a glider or other unpowered aircraft but had no marking lights, strobes or anything else an aircraft should have. mass moved from due north to south before losing sight of it. wife and i started discussing possible explanations, flock of birds, spotlights, aircraft but none fit with what we saw. after fifteen minutes, saw another one, further east and higher in the sky, again moving from north to south. over next hour plus, saw around 18, all moving in the same direction (n to s) at different altitudes. most looked like the boomeranges but some were too far away to get a proper shape, just could see the faintly glowing masses moving. masses were observed for approximately 6-10 seconds per. 
weather was clear overhead with clouds down south, temp around 60-65, with a light occaisonal breeze.
content.summary: Cloud-like boomerangs moving north to south

content.detailedDescription: On the highway heading for lake of the ozarks missouri. late at night. out from the tree tops come this craft...Round shape all colored lights around it flashing.  it was extremely close.  we could see details of craft.  it hovered over the trees , lot her cars were pulled over the highway. i was in a station wagon. dog went crazy barking   it came closer my mother was praying. loudly.    my dad yelling at us to stay in the car.  it made no noise.  i knew it was some thing spectacular what we were witnessing.... then it just flashed up in the sky.  i realize it was a long time ago but i know what i saw.  it was huge and close enough to see something similar to windows.    my parents  never talked about it again.   thought it was a demon.
content.summary: In the car with my parents, sister and our dog. on the highway late night  ufo came out of trees . pulled over . hovered for about 10 min. then  shot into atmosphere  dog  poopsie went crazy.  mom w as praying

content.detailedDescription: I saw a craft that was my guess 1.2km long, maybe 400m wide, seemed asymmetrical but had a solid round ted light about a third the way from what looked like a huge shuttle cockpit tip. there were two large aircraft that had strobes flying on either side in a v formation. my girlfriend also saw it right after i did in a place twenty miles away from here. i'll ask her to file her own report. it flew pretty low, not like right above the tree line but like enough i could make it the engines on the planes following. i do live near ft bragg and am less than fifteen miles from the camp mccoll training ground, we see paratroopers jump from time to time. but in the past two weeks i saw a couple of those unmarked black helicopters flying very low near my house. oh that reminds me, this huge thing nor the planes showed up in photos i took, and i don't think they showed up in what my gf took miles away moments later. it's weird bc i had a sighting a few months back. my first, and it was the same day i was going thru deleting pictures and came to one from that night that showed a red light, upon playing w the filters the red light appeared to be a huge rectangular structure but headed towards it was the craft id seen. showing three white lights in a triangle w a red one in the center. i didn't report it bc i watched the video i took and saw nothing, deleted it. hating that now bc thru sum filters who knows what it may have shown. i didn't even realize if snapped a picture in the process of going to video that night. and the day i come across picture, which shows in sum filters to actually be a disc shape and triangle lighting pattern, but that's the night i c a flying aircraft carrier, idk what was. b if i can attach a picture i'll send one of what i first saw and make a report on it when i can better figure out the date, but the other night, even though i could c em fairly well, nothing shows up on my camera. i see strange lights zipping around in the sky here over half the nights i look for any length of time, but those two were extraordinary, add the black helicopters and ima bit worried about what's happening around here. oh and i also saw them return the same way they cane less than forty min later
content.summary: Like an aircraft carrier w wings, flanked by bomber size aircraft w strobes, huge red light ⅓ way down a >km flat bottom

content.detailedDescription: We were pulling out of the parking lot of the northridge recreationally park onto reseda blvd facing west. while waiting to turn onto reseda going north my son saw a light in the sky. we were on the look out for meteors. he saw a light moving erratically and caught it on video. not sure if it could be a drone, but it seemed to be too high in the sky to be one. it moved quickly in a zig zag motion. we also saw two other lights moving quickly once we watched the video.
content.summary: My son saw a light moving erraticlly and recoded the vidoe on my phone.

content.detailedDescription: The pics were taken at 18:00 chilean hour yesterday october 20 at santiago city of chile, at downtown santiago av alameda ...! the ufoÂ´s were detected after the review of the pics and it was no intention the picture them on first instance ...
content.summary: Disc

content.detailedDescription: Coming home from work and was getting on the off ramp to exit the interstate and i witnessed a white dot randomly appear. i kept track of it while driving so as to be sure to not lose sight of it. it is only about a mile from the off ramp to my house. while watching it as i was driving, the object appeared to possibly, i cannot say for sure but possibly, be following me from a far distance until i made it to my house and was able to get a better glimpse of the object with some binoculars. it could be seen with the naked eye, the binoculars were just to get a better look and i could only make out 2 white lights on the bottom right but the left side was too bright to be able to make out anything more. i sat there watching it for a good 15-20 minutes hoping to catch it disappear on video with no luck. i then left to get some food, it was still there when i left, i went less then 0.5 miles to a fast food chain and was gone for only 10 minutes, when i came back and looked to see if it was still there, it had gone. the video that is uploaded is what could be seen with the naked eye. the video shows both a zoom view and the standard view of the object. the other 2 are still photos. one photo is a zoomed (zoomed in on with the phone capabilities) in unaltered photo of the object, the second picture with my finger in it is a picture that is also unaltered. if you manually zoom into the picture with my finger in it, you will see the object right above my finger. each picture and photo is taken using a samsung galaxy s7.
content.summary: White orb hovering in single location

content.detailedDescription: I take the dog out for his nightly business at 2330hrs. i look up and moving slowly from north to south is an angle shape with dim white lights. at first i thought it might be some kind of spotlight reflecting off the clouds. problem was, there were no clouds. we live close to an airport so my next thought was some kind of plane. problem there, no port/starboard indicators, no sound. it moved slow to the southeast then faded straight up into the sky.
content.summary: Chevron with white lights moving north to south

content.detailedDescription: Realizing that i'm too drunk to drive after a night at moe's tavern, i stumbled through the woods and encounter a green glowing alien. it kept on repeating "i bring you love, i bring you peace." which is when i ran. no one believes me, and the town started selling "homer is a dope"  t-shirts!
content.summary: It said "don't be afraid."

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: It was approximately 9am in st albans (london), myself and a work colleague were having a wheel changed on a car outside a small local garage. i noticed a small light up in the sky coming overhead, it looked just like a satellite and moved at a similar speed. i was still curious as it was daylight and i have never seen a satellite pass overhead during daylight so i notified my colleague about the light and he also noticed it passing overhead. it was at this moment when i noticed two more lights travelling close to the first light, these two lights were close together and travelling parallel to each other as well as at the same speed, all three lights were moving in roughly the same direction. my colleague also saw the two lights moving parallel to each other and our curiosity grew. the lights appeared way to small and distant to be any kind of airplane, especially a commercial airliner. there was also no noise whatsoever coming from the objects/lights which made me think that they weren't fighter jets. after taking my phone out and taking a snapchat video of the first three lights, my colleague and myself then noticed a fourth and fifth light passing overhead, again, travelling at roughly the same speed and in the same direction. the fifth and final light to pass overhead was a distinct red colour and noticiblly different from the rest of the lights. again, my colleague also saw the red light as well as the other four white ones. neither of us could give a reasonable explanation of what we had just seen and the experience left us both baffled. all 5 lights moved off into the distance but didn't fade away like a satellite would. the lights stayed visible until they were too far away to make out.
content.summary: Lights/objects flying parallel and at the same speed and direction. one light changes from white to red

content.detailedDescription: I was out walking the dog in a park when i looked up in the sky and saw a bright orange orb flying across the night sky, in a shake but straight line. it disappeared after approximately a minute.
content.summary: A bright orange orb went in a pretty straight line, although shaky, and then disappeared within approximately a minute after i spotted it.

content.detailedDescription: Very bright light that flickered in sky. moves but not far. starlike but much too bright and too low to be a star.
content.summary: Very bright flickering light that resembled a star but very close to ground and much bigger amd brighter

content.detailedDescription: In good weather this time of year, i go solo camping often in the jefferson-geo. washington national forest, part of which spans sw virginia.  i've done this numerous times and rarely see another human being.  depending on weather, etc., i usually stay for a week.  on 8 august 2016, my campsite was deluged with rain and wind as a tropical storm passed from the direction of new orleans to my campsite at the 4,160 ft. elevation of comer's rock on the wythe/grayson state line.  i was trapped in my tent for approximately 3.5 days because of incessant rain and very high winds.  on the afternoon of the third day (friday, 10 august 2016) i pulled my damp cot out of the tent and lay upon it and watched the sky pass overhead.  what i saw was both mind-boggling and very, very curious.  there was an extremely high layer of clouds moving very quickly to the sw and a patchy level of clouds (almost like a tight mosaic of cloud patches or cotton balls)  moving to the se - very low and far from the cloud covering a high and being quickly transported by the apparent wind. as i lay there i began to notice that the blue sky behind each of the lower clouds was showing through as a crystal clear triangle...I actually said out loud, "what the heck is that?"  it seemed to me that there were a number of "somethings" in the lower clouds and every once in a while, i could see them!  i detected nothing more than their clear shape - a couple of dozen - and the fact they seemed to be hidden in the lower clouds.  i also noted that i lay there in an extreme state of peace.  after that layer of spotty clouds moved se, the sky cleared completely and the sun returned.  during the entire week i kept wondering what the heck passed over me.....Seemed like a number of cloaked triangle-shaped crafts....Bottom line:  a series of perfect triangles manifested in a speed-moving layer of clouds, which dissipated momentarily, as the front moved through.  the thing i think about most is the feeling of peace and/or complacency i felt.  never saw anything like this before.
content.summary: Observed crystal clear triangle shapes in clouds passing overhead

content.detailedDescription:
Black triangle hovered than faded away.
i looked straight up and noticed a black triangle with white lights on the tips. it was blacker than the night sky and blocked the stars behind it. after about five seconds it started to fade away and was gone within two seconds.
content.summary: Black triangle hovered than faded away.

content.detailedDescription: I was sleeping in bed with my wife and during the night i felt that i was being toched by somebody and when i woke up... i was terd upside down and push my head aginst my pillow. i tried to fight up, but y felt y was like frowsen.  but during this event i saw some thing.
content.summary: I think it's reptilain alien

content.detailedDescription: 10/20/16 - 8:33 pm pt, took the dog out to the back yard, looked up at the night sky and observed a fast moving triangular shaped object with 6 dim white lights (one on each corner and in the middle of each side) black as the night sky, almost transparent. smooth and quiet, like nothing ive ever seen before. the fight or flight mentality took hold, i observed it until it went below the roof line of the house next store. flew in a w/sw direction, approx 1000 ft elevation appeared approx 80-100 feet long. shortly after going behind a roofline a plane was observed flying in the opposite direction at a higher altitude, approx 4000 feet. total time was approx 10 seconds.
content.summary: Triangular shaped 6 lights, one on each corner and one in the middle of each side

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home on the same road i drive home on every day. i noticed a huge light in the sky shaped like a large domed pilgrims hat. it was 3 to 4 times larger then a normal jet. i live near an international airport and am used to seeing a lot of normal air traffic. this completely illuminated object moved east to west across my path. i was driving tried to take a few pictures and video but the trees obstructed most of my shots. i have a poor video and a couple of poor pictures. attached video see seconds 9 through 15 rest is bad video of me. trying to drive to spot where could see through trees.
content.summary: 4x larger then a comercial airliner and completely illuminated.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were outside smoking at 10:10 pm.  looking up at sky i noticed a v shaped boomerang sailing across the sky.  it looked very light colored around edges/shape but could not see body in between edges.  i asked "what the hell is that?"  he looked up and saw the object and said "i have no idea."  it made no sound.  seemed to be moving much faster than a commercial plane.  i commented that it seemed white or gray at the edges and husband said it reminded him of wonder woman's plane cause it seemed transparent.  he got up to see if he could still see it, but could not.  there were three planes that appeared soon after.  the ufo was moving south and the planes came from the south, west and north.  not exactly at same time.  two were most definitely commercial planes.  dallas executive airport is only about a mile from our house.
content.summary: V shaped boomerang gliding thru air, no sound, pretty fast,  seemed transparent.  husband also saw

content.detailedDescription: Mark mitercherson. janet groom. adrian walker. macky d.
content.summary: Pasty white boy

content.detailedDescription:
Traveling home from vacaville driving north around 7:30 pm - 7:35 pm on i-505. this isn't the 1st time we have seen this object. i was nearing putah creek road exit off i-505 with my mother. i said to my mother "that aircraft is huge, and its barely moving". so, i pulled over at the exit, got out of my vehicle, and watched the object to see if it was getting closer or remaining stationary. it was definitely moving, but very slowly. the craft began to make a sweeping turn from my left to right, and what appeared to be three corner mounted lights appeared to get brighter as it turned. there was a lesser white light toward the rear, and there may have been red blinking lights, but i can't be sure. i snapped several cellphone pictures of it. what struck me as odd was that this craft was probably the size of a 747 or a large military transport like they fly out of travis air force base 30 miles south and west of my position. and, it was perfectly quiet, not a sound. the craft was i would say between 500 and 1,000 feet altitude. i thought this might be an experimental craft that would be flown out of beale afb, or one out of travis afb. from what i have read, there are experimental craft flying out of beale afb, and not travis afb. i thought this might be a tr3 from what i have read. 
i took pictures with my cellphone camera, but they just aren't very good.
content.summary: 3 or 4 white lights. appeared rectangular, no noise perfectly quiet
